Gameplay: Multiple types of gamemodes from casual to competitive and some minigames like death match and more. Its a shooter but not like cod because it requires you to aim differently and learn gun patterns to hit your shots. 

Graphics: Good, and has settings from low to super high resolution. You shouldnt need a super computer to run this because the game has been optimized by devs for best fps on public maps. A good computer is recommended for playing without any frame drops if you want an advantage in game.

Pros:
-multiplayer
-Not pay 2 win
-Cool Skins for guns
-Good Learning Curve

Cons:
-Community can be toxic at times
-Still tons of hackers 
-Case system sucks if you dont want to spend money for skins

Final Thoughts: Good game, Give it a try if you want a more skill based shooter.
